mapper.select: SELECT d.device_number,d.`device_type_id`,d.`device_address`, d.`device_full_address`,d.`rows`,d.`electric`,dt.device_type_name, d.`status` FROM hospital_user AS hu left JOIN hospital AS h ON h.`hospital_id` = hu.`hospital_id` INNER JOIN device AS d ON d.`hospital_id` = h.`hospital_id` INNER JOIN device_type AS dt ON dt.device_type_id = d.`device_type_id` WHERE hu.`user_name` = #{userId}

SELECT ifnull(count(1),0) FROM hospital_user AS hu left JOIN hospital AS h ON h.`hospital_id` = hu.`hospital_id` INNER JOIN device AS d ON d.`hospital_id` = h.`hospital_id` INNER JOIN device_type AS dt ON dt.device_type_id = d.`device_type_id` WHERE hu.`user_name` = #{userId}

SELECT ifnull(count(1),0) FROM hospital_user AS hu left JOIN hospital AS h ON h.`hospital_id` = hu.`hospital_id` INNER JOIN device AS d ON d.`hospital_id` = h.`hospital_id` INNER JOIN device_type AS dt ON dt.device_type_id = d.`device_type_id` WHERE hu.`user_name` = #{userId} and d.status = 3

SELECT d.device_number,d.`device_type_id`,ifnull(h.`hospital_name`,'æ— ') as hospital_name, d.`device_address`,d.`status`,d.`rows`,dt.`device_type_name` FROM hospital_user AS hu left JOIN hospital AS h ON hu.`hospital_id` = h.`hospital_id` INNER JOIN device AS d ON d.`hospital_id` = h.`hospital_id` INNER JOIN device_type AS dt ON dt.`device_type_id` = d.`device_type_id`
hu.`user_name` = #{userId} AND d.`status` = 3
AND (d.`device_number` like concat('%',#{deviceNumber},'%') OR d.`device_address` like concat('%',#{deviceNumber},'%'))

SELECT ifnull(count(1),0) FROM hospital_user AS hu left JOIN hospital AS h ON hu.`hospital_id` = h.`hospital_id` INNER JOIN device AS d ON d.`hospital_id` = h.`hospital_id` INNER JOIN device_type AS dt ON dt.`device_type_id` = d.`device_type_id`
hu.`user_name` = #{userId} AND d.`status` = 3
AND (d.`device_number` like concat('%',#{deviceNumber},'%') OR d.`device_address` like concat('%',#{deviceNumber},'%'))

SELECT suf.feedback_id,d.device_number,d.`device_address`, suf.feedback_type,suf.status,suf.feedback_info,suf.feedback_url, suf.device_picture,suf.create_time FROM hospital_user AS hu left JOIN hospital AS h ON h.`hospital_id` = hu.`hospital_id` INNER JOIN device AS d ON d.`hospital_id` = h.`hospital_id` INNER JOIN sys_user_feedback AS suf ON suf.device_number = d.`device_number`
hu.`user_name` = #{userId}
and (d.device_address like concat('%',#{deviceNumber},'%') or d.device_number like concat('%',#{deviceNumber},'%'))
ORDER BY suf.`feedback_time` DESC

SELECT dt.`device_type_name`,d.device_number,d.`device_address`,d.`device_full_address`, ifnull(h.`hospital_name`,'æ— ') as hospital_name,d.`status`,d.`electric`,d.`time`,IFNULL(SUM(ulo.play_time),0) AS platTime FROM hospital_user AS hu left JOIN hospital AS h ON h.`hospital_id` = hu.`hospital_id` INNER JOIN device AS d ON d.`hospital_id` = h.`hospital_id` INNER JOIN device_type AS dt ON dt.`device_type_id` = d.`device_type_id` LEFT JOIN user_lease_order AS ulo ON ulo.`hospitalId` = hu.`hospital_id` WHERE hu.`user_name` = #{userId} AND d.device_number = #{deviceNumber}

SELECT d.`device_number`,dt.`device_type_name`,IFNULL(h.`hospital_name`,'æ— ') AS hospital_name,d.`device_address`, d.`rows`,d.`device_type_id` FROM device AS d INNER JOIN device_type AS dt ON dt.`device_type_id` = d.`device_type_id` LEFT JOIN hospital AS h ON h.`hospital_id` = d.`hospital_id` WHERE d.device_number = #{deviceNumber}

SELECT suf.feedback_id,suf.device_number,suf.feedback_info, suf.feedback_url,suf.feedback_type,d.device_address,suf.`status` FROM sys_user_feedback AS suf INNER JOIN device AS d ON d.`device_number` = suf.`device_number` WHERE suf.`feedback_id` = #{feedbackId}
